text: Karagulovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Meshchegarovsky Selsoviet, Salavatsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 231 as of 2010. There are 4 streets. == Geography == It is located 47 km from Maloyaz, 6 km from Mursalimkino. == References == Category:Rural localities in Salavatsky District
title: Karagulovo
